scripts.build: npm run build:next && npm run build:server
scripts.d: cp nextconfig/development.config.js next.config.js && npm run build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/app.js --name develop-front && pm2 log
scripts.p: cp nextconfig/patch.config.js next.config.js && npm run build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/app.js --name patch-front && pm2 log
scripts.s: cp nextconfig/stg.config.js next.config.js && npm run build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/app.js --name stg-front && pm2 log
scripts.pro: cp nextconfig/production.config.js next.config.js && npm run build && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/app.js --name production-front && pm2 log
